data.strFullDescription:
[b]This is a free unofficial fan-made project, made out of love for hololive, hololive fans, and the fighting game genre.
After 2 long years of hard work, the first complete fan-made hololive fighting game is here![/b]

[h2][b]◆  Easy Controls[/b][/h2]
Pick up on this game’s easy-to-learn control scheme in no time to get straight into playing. Even hololive fans who are inexperienced with traditional fighting games can have fun!

[h2][b]◆  Rollback Netcode[/b][/h2]
Besto Games has been hard at work developing the game’s online rollback netcode to make the online experience as smooth as we can.

[h2][b]◆  An Immersive hololive Experience[/b][/h2]
Explore the vast world of hololive from our roster of iconic hololive talents, with moves inspired by their most memorable moments and personality traits. Fight across the virtual world in lovingly recreated hololive locations. Jam out to remixes of your favorite hololive original songs while raising idol hell.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1742020/extras/cool_references.gif?t=1683707131[/img]

[h2][b]◆  Fast 2D Combat[/b][/h2]
hololive talents are reimagined as core fighting game archetypes with a unique twist. Raise chaos in the battlefield with flashy attacks and high-octane action.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1742020/extras/fast_gameplay.gif?t=1683707131[/img]
data.strSnippet: Made by hololive fans, for hololive fans. Idol Showdown is the definitive fan-made hololive fighting game experience, powered by rollback netcode. Engage in exciting duels as your favorite hololive talent and prove once and for all who the strongest idol is using the game’s easy-to-learn controls.
